title: White Zombie (restored, colorized) (1932, pre-code horror, imdb score: 6.3)

sources.title: White Zombie (restored, colorized) (1932, pre-code horror, imdb score: 6.3)
sources.description: White Zombie  is a 1932 American  pre-Code   horror film   independently  produced by Edward Halperin and directed by  Victor Halperin . The screenplay by Garnett Weston, based on  The Magic Island  by  William Seabrook , is about a young woman's transformation into a zombie at the hands of an evil  voodoo  master.  Bela Lugosi  stars as the zombie master "Murder" Legendre, with  Madge Bellamy  appearing as his victim. Other cast members include  Joseph Cawthorn ,  Robert W. Frazer ,  John Harron ,  Brandon Hurst , and George Burr MacAnnan.
